name: Changeable! (Demo)
description:
Hello! Welcome to Changeable! This is a short demo of a game I made a while back. I was going to upload this a LONGGGG time ago, but there was problems with Pyinstaller not working and stuff like that.

Anyway, in this game, you control a cute little cube, but eventually, you'll reach a point where the levels impossible! Maybe.... if you.... pause?

This game will probably not be worked on anymore because its made of old code and I just don't feel like trying to make sense of my old, bad, code.

You can still give me feedback and stuff, maybe I'll update it, but this probably wont become a full game.

Thanks for reading this, cya! (:

(This game was made with Python and Pygame)
